body.p: Objective: We want to dump to CSV data from the Ticket Export endpoint of the Zendesk API version 2.0.
Tools: You'll need the curlWrap function, as always.

Notes: While we are developing and testing our code we'll want to use the sample endpoint which gives us the same sample data over and over. The purpose of this is that the sample endpoint is more forgiving and developed for this very purpose.

ol.li: You can get the curlWrap function here: ***FIXME***<script src="https://gist.github.com/2920899.js"> </script>
Put this in a new script file called csv.php
We now have a file handler that is stored in the variable $fh. When we refer to things we will be doing with or to our new CSV file we will use that variable.
